title: Ep. 639 - The 1776 Report
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, one of Trump’s best achievements as president just came this week, at the very end. His administration’s 1776 Report offers a needed corrective to the anti-American brainwashing in schools. Of course the Left is steaming mad about it. Also Five Headlines including Katie Couric wondering how conservatives might be “deprogramed,” and Nancy Pelosi discusses the “trauma” congress suffered during the riots on January 6. And in our Daily Cancellation, we will cancel some very bad parenting advice on Tik Tok. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
